title: Baxian
synopsis: The emergence of the magical jade misty flute has attracted a large number of monsters and monsters to scramble for it. Lan Caihe, who just wants to study medicine, He Xiangu who is possessed by the cat demon, Tieguai Li who stubbornly guards the iron shop, the cultivator Zhang Guolao and Cao Guojiu, and Han Xiangzi, who has no wisdom and lazy practice, are all separate The six people living in a comfortable life are gathered together because of divine tools, or they are mortals, how can they fight against many demons? The war is imminent, how will the eight people save the world? (translated from douban)
